titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Patsy T. Mink, a Representative from Hawaii.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 566.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with an additional 30 minutes of debate on H. Res. 566 by unanimous consent.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/1/2002--Passed House without amendment. Resolves that: (1) the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Patsy T. Mink, a Representative from Hawaii; and (2) a delegation of House and Senate Members be appointed to attend the funeral.
